rounds.response:
On a rainbow flop of 5♥-K♣-7♣ I hold pocket 6s, giving me just an under-pair to the board and no real draws. I still have a decent chance of being best (P0 may easily have missed this flop), but I have to tread carefully.

I’ll make a small probe bet to charge any random ace-high hands and see where I stand. A bet of about ⅓ the pot accomplishes this without risking a huge portion of my stack.

[Bet 30]
